alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Inland Indian River (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 3:56PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Indian River County through 430 PM EDT... At 356 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vero Lake Estates, or near Fellsmere, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sebastian, Fellsmere, Vero Beach South, Pointe West, and Vero Lake Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Indian River; Inland Indian River
